entry.title: Clean Pelican theme
entry.summary:
About

This site is a place to collect my web projects, and also was a way for me to to familiarize myself to some extent with Pelican.

I have open-sourced the theme that this site uses. I am far from an expert with Pelican, and the code is still under development (in other words a bit of a mess) but it works for me.

Technology

This site is generated with Pelican, a Python static site generator. It makes use of Typeplate.css, Pygments.css, Reset.css, Python, Jinja2 templating, and my custom Pelican theme, Clean.

entry.title: Automathic.org
entry.summary:
View Site


About

This was one of the first forays I made into serious web development. I have not open-sourced it yet because the code is a mess, but I intend to when I have a chance to clean it up a bit.

Technology

Automathic is built on PHP/MySQL, with as little JavaScript as possible.

It uses a good bit of third-party code, including PHPMarkdown, a user system written by Photosythesis, Hint.css, Mathjax, Jquery, and Entypo Pictograms. It doesn’t use Bootstrap.
